mn118:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde sambahulehi abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ—
mn118:1.3_0: āyasmatā ca sāriputtena āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānena āyasmatā ca mahākassapena āyasmatā ca mahākaccāyanena
mn118:1.3_1: āyasmatā ca mahākoṭṭhikena āyasmatā ca mahākappinena āyasmatā ca mahācundena āyasmatā ca anuruddhena
mn118:1.3_2: āyasmatā ca revatena āyasmatā ca ānandena,
mn118:1.3_3: aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ.
mn118:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena therā bhikkhū nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
mn118:2.2_0: Appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:2.2_1: appekacce therā bhikkhū vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:2.2_2: appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṁsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:2.2_3: appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
mn118:2.3_0: Te ca navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ jānanti.
mn118:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
mn118:3.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn118:4.3_2: bhiyyoso mattāya vīriyaṁ ārabhatha appattassa pattiyā,
mn118:5.2_0: “bhagavā kira tattheva sāvatthiyaṁ komudiṁ cātumāsiniṁ āgamessatī”ti.
mn118:5.3_0: Te jānapadā bhikkhū sāvatthiṁ osaranti bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
mn118:6.1_0: Te ca kho therā bhikkhū bhiyyoso mattāya nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
mn118:6.2_0: Appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:6.2_1: appekacce therā bhikkhū vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:6.2_2: appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṁsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:6.2_3: appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
mn118:6.3_0: Te ca navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ jānanti.
mn118:7.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase komudiyā cātumāsiniyā puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
mn118:7.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn118:8.1_0: “Apalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā; nippalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā; suddhā sāre patiṭṭhitā.
mn118:8.2_0: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
mn118:8.3_0: yathārūpā parisā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
mn118:8.4_0: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
mn118:8.5_0: yathārūpāya parisāya appaṁ dinnaṁ bahu hoti, bahu dinnaṁ bahutaraṁ.
mn118:8.6_0: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
mn118:8.8_0: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
mn118:8.9_0: yathārūpaṁ parisaṁ alaṁ yojanagaṇanāni dassanāya gantuṁ puṭosenāpi.
mn118:9.1_2: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā—
mn118:9.2_0: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
mn118:10.1_2: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā—
mn118:10.2_0: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
mn118:11.1_2: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva
mn118:11.2_0: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
mn118:12.1_2: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā—
mn118:12.2_0: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
mn118:13.1_2: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti—
mn118:13.2_0: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
mn118:14.1_2: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe catunnaṁ sammappadhānānaṁ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti …pe…
mn118:14.7_0: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
mn118:14.8_0: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe mettābhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti …
mn118:14.14_0: evarūpāpi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe.
mn118:14.15_0: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe ānāpānassatibhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti.
mn118:15.1_0: Ānāpānassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā.
mn118:15.2_0: Ānāpānassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti.
mn118:15.3_0: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti.
mn118:15.4_0: Satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrenti.
mn118:16.1_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati kathaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā?
mn118:17.1_2: bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
mn118:20.2_0: ‘abhippamodayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘abhippamodayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
mn118:20.3_0: ‘samādahaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘samādahaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
mn118:20.4_0: ‘vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘vimocayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati.
mn118:22.1_0: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati evaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā.
mn118:23.1_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati kathaṁ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti?
mn118:24.1_2: bhikkhu dīghaṁ vā assasanto ‘dīghaṁ assasāmī’ti pajānāti,
mn118:24.5_2: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:24.6_0: Kāyesu kāyaññatarāhaṁ, bhikkhave, evaṁ vadāmi yadidaṁ—assāsapassāsā.
mn118:24.7_2: kāye kāyānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:25.5_2: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:25.6_0: Vedanāsu vedanāññatarāhaṁ, bhikkhave, evaṁ vadāmi yadidaṁ—assāsapassāsānaṁ sādhukaṁ manasikāraṁ.
mn118:25.7_2: vedanāsu vedanānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:26.2_0: ‘abhippamodayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘abhippamodayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
mn118:26.3_0: ‘samādahaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘samādahaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
mn118:26.4_0: ‘vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘vimocayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
mn118:26.5_2: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:26.6_0: Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa ānāpānassatiṁ vadāmi.
mn118:26.7_2: citte cittānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:27.5_2: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:27.6_0: So yaṁ taṁ abhijjhādomanassānaṁ pahānaṁ taṁ paññāya disvā sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
mn118:27.7_2: dhammesu dhammānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:28.1_0: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassati evaṁ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti.
mn118:29.1_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kathaṁ bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti?
mn118:30.1_2: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ,
mn118:30.1_3: upaṭṭhitāssa tasmiṁ samaye sati hoti asammuṭṭhā.
mn118:30.2_3: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti.
mn118:30.2_5: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:31.1_0: So tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati.
mn118:31.2_2: bhikkhu tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati,
mn118:31.2_3: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:31.2_5: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:32.1_0: Tassa taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ.
mn118:32.2_2: bhikkhuno taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ,
mn118:32.2_3: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:32.2_5: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:33.2_3: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:33.2_5: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:34.2_4: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:34.2_6: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:35.2_3: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:35.2_5: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:36.1_0: So tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
mn118:36.2_2: bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti,
mn118:36.2_3: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:36.2_5: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.2_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ,
mn118:38.2_1: upaṭṭhitāssa tasmiṁ samaye sati hoti asammuṭṭhā.
mn118:38.3_3: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.3_5: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.4_0: So tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati.
mn118:38.5_2: bhikkhu tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati,
mn118:38.5_3: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.5_5: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.6_0: Tassa taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ.
mn118:38.7_2: bhikkhuno taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ,
mn118:38.7_3: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.7_5: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.9_3: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.9_5: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.11_4: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.11_6: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.13_3: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.13_5: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:39.1_0: So tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
mn118:39.2_2: bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti,
mn118:39.2_3: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:39.2_5: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:40.1_0: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā evaṁ bahulīkatā satta sambojjhaṅge paripūrenti.
mn118:41.1_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā kathaṁ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrenti?
mn118:42.1_2: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
mn118:42.7_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
mn118:43.1_0: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā evaṁ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrentī”ti.
mn118:43.3_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
